text: @NikkiHaley Yeah, this Covid-19 is a he** of a rainy day, isn't it?  No money for States = no money for school, police, fire depts, etc.  Taxpayers are already paying for mismanagement of a poorly run federal gov't.  He**, some are literally paying with their lives.
